name: Lum from Urusei Yatsura (2022)
description:
Lum from the anime Urusei Yatsura (2022). Trained on screenshots and conveys it's vibrant style, but obviously doesn't match up well with realism. However, you can try it with a weight of 0.7 and lower.

The site already has Lum, but I wanted the anime style for myself.

My first LoRa, so don't expect a miracle. I tried to use different poses and clothes to achieve a good result. Personally, I'm happy with what I got, because Lum looks great and conveys the style of the anime.

Trained on Anything 3.0, Clip Skip 2.

P.S. Negative promt affects the colors. Here's the negative promt that I use::

(worst quality, low quality:1.4), EasyNegative, bad-artist, low res, (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, blurry, amputation
